items.title: The boys’ club no one was supposed to write about
items.summary: Reporter Zoë Bernard spent months talking to 51 people (31 of them gay men) to map out a subculture that's been an open secret in Silicon Valley for years: gay men, at the upper echelons of tech, quietly raising up their own networks the way powerful people have always done.
items.summary_zh: 记者佐伊·伯纳德（ Zoë Bernard ）花了几个月的时间与51人（其中31人是男同性恋者）交谈，绘制了一个多年来在硅谷一直是一个公开秘密的亚文化：男同性恋者，在科技的高层，悄悄地建立自己的网络，就像有权势的人一直做的那样。

items.title: The U.S. and China Are Pursuing Different AI Futures
items.summary: More money has been invested in AI than it took to land on the moon. Spending on the technology this year is projected to reach up to $700 billion, almost double last year’s spending. Part of the impetus for this frantic outlay is a conviction among investors and policymakers in the United States that it needs to “beat China.” Indeed, headlines have long cast AI development as a zero-sum rivalry between the U.S. and China, framing the technology’s advance as an arms race with a defined finish li
items.summary_zh: 在人工智能上投入的资金超过了登陆月球所需的资金。今年的技术支出预计将达到7000亿美元，几乎是去年支出的两倍。这一疯狂支出的部分动力是美国投资者和政策制定者坚信它需要“击败中国”。事实上，长期以来，头条新闻一直将人工智能开发视为美国和中国之间的零和竞争，将人工智能技术

items.title: IEEE Course Improves Engineers’ Writing Skills
items.summary:
In the rapidly evolving world of engineering technology, professionals devote enormous energy to such tasks as mastering the latest frameworks, optimizing architectures, and refining machine learning models. It’s easy to let technical expertise become the sole measure of professional value. However, one of the most important skills an engineer can develop is the capacity to write and communicate effectively.
Whether you’re conducting research at a university or leading systems development projec
items.summary_zh:
在快速发展的工程技术世界中，专业人士将大量精力投入到掌握最新框架、优化架构和完善机器学习模型等任务中。 很容易让技术专业知识成为专业价值的唯一衡量标准。 然而，工程师可以培养的最重要的技能之一是有效写作和沟通的能力。
无论您是否在进行研究

items.title: Tomorrow’s Smart Pills Will Deliver Drugs and Take Biopsies
items.summary:
One day soon, a doctor might prescribe a pill that doesn’t just deliver medicine but also reports back on what it finds inside you—and then takes actions based on its findings.
Instead of scheduling an endoscopy or CT scan, you’d swallow an electronic capsule smaller than a multivitamin. As it travels through your digestive system, it could check tissue health, look for cancerous changes, and send data to your doctor. It could even release drugs exactly where they’re needed or snip a tiny biopsy
items.summary_zh:
不久的将来，医生可能会开出一种药丸，不仅可以提供药物，还可以报告它在你体内发现的内容，然后根据其发现采取行动。
与其安排内窥镜检查或CT扫描，不如吞下比多种维生素更小的电子胶囊。 当它穿过你的消化系统时，它可以检查组织健康状况，寻找癌变，并将数据发送给你的医生。 它甚至可以释放

items.title: Lidar Mobility Device Assists Navigation and Avoids Collisions
items.summary:
At CES 2026 in Las Vegas, Singapore-based startup Strutt introduced the EV1, a powered personal mobility device that uses lidar, cameras, and onboard computing for collision avoidance. Unlike manually-steered powered wheelchairs, the EV1 assists with navigation in both indoor and outdoor environments—stopping or rerouting itself before a collision can occur.
Strutt describes its approach as “shared control,” in which the user sets direction and speed, while the device intervenes to avoid unsafe
items.summary_zh:
在拉斯维加斯举行的CES 2026上，新加坡初创公司Strutt推出了EV1 ，这是一种使用激光雷达、摄像头和机载计算来避免碰撞的动力个人移动设备。 与手动转向电动轮椅不同， EV1有助于在室内和室外环境中导航，在发生碰撞之前停止或改变路线。
Strutt将其方法描述为“共享控制” ，其中用户设置方向

items.title: Estimating Surface Heating of an Atmospheric Reentry Vehicle With Simulation
items.summary:
Join Hannah Alpert (NASA Ames) to explore thermal data from the record-breaking 6-meter LOFTID inflatable aeroshell. Learn how COMSOL Multiphysics® was used to perform inverse analysis on flight thermocouple data, validating heat flux gauges and preflight CFD predictions. Attendees will gain technical insights into improving thermal models for future HIAD missions, making this essential for engineers seeking to advance atmospheric reentry design. The session concludes with a live Q&A.

Register
items.summary_zh: 与Hannah Alpert （ NASA Ames ）一起探索来自破纪录的6米LOFTID充气式气壳的热数据。了解如何使用COMSOL Multiphysics ®对飞行热电偶数据进行反向分析，验证热通量计和飞行前CFD预测。与会者将获得为未来HIAD任务改进热模型的技术见解，这对于寻求推进大气再入设计的工程师至关重要

items.title: We’re Measuring Data Center Sustainability Wrong
items.summary:
In 2024, Google claimed that their data centers are 1.5x more energy efficient than industry average. In 2025, Microsoft committed billions to nuclear power for AI workloads. The data center industry tracks power usage effectiveness to three decimal places and optimizes water usage intensity with machine precision. We report direct emissions and energy emissions with religious fervor.
These are laudable advances, but these metrics account for only 30 percent of total emissions from the IT sector
items.summary_zh:
2024年，谷歌声称其数据中心的能源效率是行业平均水平的1.5倍。 2025年，微软投入数十亿美元用于人工智能工作负载的核电。 数据中心行业将电力使用效率追踪到小数点后三位，并通过机器精度优化用水强度。 我们以宗教热情报告直接排放和能源排放。
这些都是值得称赞的进步，但这些指标占ONL

items.title: This Former Physicist Helps Keep the Internet Secure
items.summary:
When Alan DeKok began a side project in network security, he didn’t expect to start a 27-year career. In fact, he didn’t initially set out to work in computing at all.
DeKok studied nuclear physics before making the switch to a part of network computing that is foundational but—like nuclear physics—largely invisible to those not directly involved in the field. Eventually, a project he started as a hobby became a full-time job: maintaining one of the primary systems that helps keep the internet s
items.summary_zh:
当Alan DeKok开始网络安全方面的副业时，他没想到会开始27年的职业生涯。 事实上，他最初根本没有打算从事计算工作。
DeKok学习核物理，然后转向网络计算的一部分，这是基础的，但就像核物理一样，对于那些不直接参与该领域的人来说基本上是不可见的。 最终，他作为业余爱好开始的一个项目变成了一份全职工作：

items.title: NASA Let AI Drive the Perseverance Rover
items.summary:
In December, NASA took another small, incremental step towards autonomous surface rovers. In a demonstration, the Perseverance team used AI to generate the rover’s waypoints. Perseverance used the AI waypoints on two separate days, traveling a total of 456 meters without human control.
“This demonstration shows how far our capabilities have advanced and broadens how we will explore other worlds,” said NASA Administrator Jared Isaacman. “Autonomous technologies like this can help missions to oper
items.summary_zh:
去年12月，美国宇航局朝着自主表面探测器又迈出了一小步。 在一次演示中， Perseverance团队使用人工智能来生成漫游车的路点。 Perseverance在两个不同的日子里使用了人工智能路标，在没有人工控制的情况下总共行驶了456米。
美国宇航局局长贾里德·艾萨克曼（ Jared Isaacman ）说： “这次演示显示了我们的能力已经取得了多大的进步，并拓宽了我们探索其他世界的方式。”

items.title: Sub-$200 Lidar Could Reshuffle  Auto Sensor Economics
items.summary: MicroVision, a solid-state sensor technology company located in Redmond, Wash., says it has designed a solid-state automotive lidar sensor intended to reach production pricing below US $200. That’s less than half of typical prices now, and it’s not even the full extent of the company’s ambition. The company says its longer-term goal is $100 per unit. MicroVision’s claim, which, if realized, would place lidar within reach of advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) rather than limiting it to hig
items.summary_zh: 位于华盛顿州雷德蒙德的固态传感器技术公司MicroVision表示，它已经设计了一种固态汽车激光雷达传感器，其生产价格将低于200 $。这还不到现在典型价格的一半，甚至还不是公司雄心勃勃的全部。该公司表示，其长期目标是每单位100 $。MicroVision的说法，如果实现，将激光雷达置于先进驱动器的触手可及的范围内

items.title: TryEngineering Marks 20 Years of Getting Kids Interested in STEM
items.summary:
IEEE TryEngineering is celebrating 20 years of empowering educators with resources that introduce engineering to students at an early age. Launched in 2006 as a collaboration between IEEE, IBM, and the New York Hall of Science (NYSCI), TryEngineering began with a clear goal: Make engineering accessible, understandable, and engaging for students and the teachers who support them.
What started as an idea within IEEE Educational Activities has grown into a global platform supporting preuniversity e
items.summary_zh:
IEEE TryEngineering正在庆祝20年来为教育工作者提供资源，在早期向学生介绍工程学。 作为IEEE、IBM和纽约科学馆（ NYSCI ）之间的合作， TryEngineering于2006年推出，始于一个明确的目标：为学生和支持他们的教师提供易于理解和参与的工程。
最初作为IEEE教育活动中的一个想法已经发展壮大

items.title: Video Friday: Robot Collective Stays Alive Even When Parts Die
items.summary:
Video Friday is your weekly selection of awesome robotics videos, collected by your friends at IEEE Spectrum robotics. We also post a weekly calendar of upcoming robotics events for the next few months. Please send us your events for inclusion.
ICRA 2026: 1–5 June 2026, VIENNA
Enjoy today’s videos!

 
No system is immune to failure. The compromise between reducing failures and improving adaptability is a recurring problem in robotics. Modular robots exemplify this tradeoff, because the number of
items.summary_zh:
Video Friday是您每周精选的机器人视频，由您在IEEE Spectrum robotics的朋友收集。 我们还发布了未来几个月即将举行的机器人活动的每周日历。 请将您的活动发送给我们。
ICRA 2026 ： 2026年6月1日至5日，维也纳
享受今天的视频！

 
任何系统都不能幸免于故障。 减少故障和提高适应性之间的妥协是机器人技术中一个反复出现的问题。模块化

items.title: GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
items.summary: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.
items.summary_zh: 新的预印本显示GPT-5.2提出了胶子振幅的新公式，后来由OpenAI和学术合作者正式证明和验证。

items.title: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
items.summary: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.
items.summary_zh: 在ChatGPT中引入锁定模式和高风险标签，以帮助组织抵御及时注入和人工智能驱动的数据泄露。

items.title: Scaling social science research
items.summary: GABRIEL is a new open-source toolkit from OpenAI that uses GPT to turn qualitative text and images into quantitative data, helping social scientists analyze research at scale.
items.summary_zh: GABRIEL是OpenAI的一个新的开源工具包，它使用GPT将定性文本和图像转化为定量数据，帮助社会科学家大规模分析研究。

items.title: Beyond rate limits: scaling access to Codex and Sora
items.summary: How OpenAI built a real-time access system combining rate limits, usage tracking, and credits to power continuous access to Sora and Codex.
items.summary_zh: OpenAI如何构建一个结合速率限制、使用跟踪和信用额度的实时访问系统，以推动对Sora和Codex的持续访问。

items.title: LEDs Enter the Nanoscale
items.summary:
MicroLEDs, with pixels just micrometers across, have long been a byword in the display world. Now, microLED-makers have begun shrinking their creations into the uncharted nano realm. In January, a startup named Polar Light Technologies unveiled prototype blue LEDs less than 500 nanometers across. This raises a tempting question: How far can LEDs shrink?
We know the answer is, at least, considerably smaller. In the past year, two different research groups have demonstrated LED pixels at sizes of
items.summary_zh:
MicroLED的像素直径仅为微米，长期以来一直是显示器领域的代名词。 现在， microLED制造商已经开始将他们的作品缩小到未知的纳米领域。 今年1月，一家名为Polar Light Technologies的初创公司推出了直径小于500纳米的蓝色LED原型。 这就提出了一个诱人的问题： LED可以收缩多远？
我们知道答案至少要小得多。 在过去的一年里，两项不同的研究

items.title: What the FDA’s 2026 Update Means for Wearables
items.summary: As new consumer hardware and software capabilities have bumped up against medicine over the last few years, consumers and manufacturers alike have struggled with identifying the line between “wellness” products such as earbuds that can also amplify and clarify surrounding speakers’ voices and regulated medical devices such as conventional hearing aids. On January 6, 2026, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration issued new guidance documents clarifying how it interprets existing law for the review
items.summary_zh: 随着新的消费硬件和软件功能在过去几年中与医药产品发生冲突，消费者和制造商都在努力确定耳机等“健康”产品之间的界限，这些产品还可以放大和澄清周围扬声器的声音，以及常规助听器等受监管的医疗设备。2026年1月6日，美国食品药品监督管理局发布了新的指导文件c

items.title: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark
items.summary: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark—our first real-time coding model. 15x faster generation, 128k context, now in research preview for ChatGPT Pro users.
items.summary_zh: 推出GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark--我们的第一个实时编码模型。生成速度提高15倍，上下文为128k ，现已进入ChatGPT Pro用户的研究预览。

items.title: Rediscovering the Lost Legacy of Chemist Jan Czochralski
items.summary:
During times of political turmoil, history often gets rewritten, erased, or lost. That is what happened to the legacy of Jan Czochralski, a Polish chemist whose contributions to semiconductor manufacturing were expunged after World War II.
In 1916 he invented a method for growing single crystals of semiconductors, metals, and synthetic gemstones. The process, now known as the Czochralski method, allows scientists to have more control over a semiconductor’s quality.
After the war ended, Czochrals
items.summary_zh:
在政治动荡时期，历史经常被改写、抹去或丢失。 波兰化学家扬·乔克拉尔斯基（ Jan Czochralski ）的遗产就是如此，他对半导体制造的贡献在第二次世界大战后被抹去了。
1916年，他发明了一种生长半导体、金属和合成宝石单晶的方法。 这个过程现在被称为Czochralski方法，使科学家能够更好地控制

items.title: Tips for Using AI Tools in Technical Interviews
items.summary:
This article is crossposted from IEEE Spectrum’s careers newsletter. Sign up now to get insider tips, expert advice, and practical strategies, written in partnership with tech career development company Parsity and delivered to your inbox for free!
We’d like to introduce Brian Jenney, a senior software engineer and owner of Parsity, an online education platform that helps people break into AI and modern software roles through hands-on training. Brian will be sharing his advice on engineering car
items.summary_zh:
本文交叉发布自IEEE Spectrum的职业通讯。 立即注册，获取与科技职业发展公司Parsity合作撰写的内幕提示、专家建议和实用策略，并免费发送到您的收件箱！
我们想向您介绍高级软件工程师和Parsity的所有者Brian Jenney ， Parsity是一个在线教育平台，通过实践培训帮助人们进入人工智能和现代软件角色

items.title: Kimwolf Botnet Swamps Anonymity Network I2P
items.summary: For the past week, the massive "Internet of Things" (IoT) botnet known as Kimwolf has been disrupting the The Invisible Internet Project (I2P), a decentralized, encrypted communications network designed to anonymize and secure online communications. I2P users started reporting disruptions in the network around the same time the Kimwolf botmasters began relying on it to evade takedown attempts against the botnet's control servers.
items.summary_zh: 在过去的一周里，被称为Kimwolf的大规模“物联网” （ IoT ）僵尸网络一直在颠覆隐形互联网项目（ I2P ） ，这是一个旨在匿名化和保护在线通信的去中心化加密通信网络。I2P用户开始报告网络中断的同时， Kimwolf僵尸程序管理员开始依靠它来逃避针对僵尸网络控制服务器的删除尝试。

items.title: How Can AI Companions Be Helpful, not Harmful?
items.summary:
For a different perspective on AI companions, see our Q&A with Jaime Banks: How Do You Define an AI Companion?
Novel technology is often a double-edged sword. New capabilities come with new risks, and artificial intelligence is certainly no exception.
AI used for human companionship, for instance, promises an ever-present digital friend in an increasingly lonely world. Chatbots dedicated to providing social support have grown to host millions of users, and they’re now being embodied in physical
items.summary_zh:
有关AI伙伴的不同观点，请参阅我们与Jaime Banks的问答：如何定义AI伙伴？
新技术往往是一把双刃剑。 新功能带来了新的风险，人工智能当然也不例外。
例如，用于人类友谊的人工智能承诺在一个越来越孤独的世界中永远存在的数字朋友。 致力于提供社交支持的聊天机器人已经发展到接待数百万

items.title: How Do You Define an AI Companion?
items.summary:
For a different perspective on AI companions, see our Q&A with Brad Knox: How Can AI Companions Be Helpful, not Harmful?
AI models intended to provide companionship for humans are on the rise. People are already frequently developing relationships with chatbots, seeking not just a personal assistant but a source of emotional support.
In response, apps dedicated to providing companionship (such as Character.ai or Replika) have recently grown to host millions of users. Some companies are now putti
items.summary_zh:
有关人工智能伙伴的不同观点，请参阅我们与Brad Knox的问答：人工智能伙伴如何有帮助，而不是有害？
旨在为人类提供陪伴的人工智能模型正在兴起。 人们已经经常与聊天机器人发展关系，不仅寻求个人助理，而且寻求情感支持。
作为回应，致力于提供陪伴的应用程序（如Character.ai或Replika ）最近已经发展到

items.title: Harness engineering: leveraging Codex in an agent-first world
items.summary: By Ryan Lopopolo, Member of the Technical Staff
items.summary_zh: 作者： Ryan Lopopolo ，技术人员

items.title: Patch Tuesday, February 2026 Edition
items.summary: Microsoft today released updates to fix more than 50 security holes in its Windows operating systems and other software, including patches for a whopping six "zero-day" vulnerabilities that attackers are already exploiting in the wild.
items.summary_zh: 微软今天发布了更新，修复了其Windows操作系统和其他软件中的50多个安全漏洞，包括针对攻击者已经在野外利用的六个“零日”漏洞的补丁。

items.title: How and When the Memory Chip Shortage Will End
items.summary:
If it feels these days as if everything in technology is about AI, that’s because it is. And nowhere is that more true than in the market for computer memory. Demand, and profitability, for the type of DRAM used to feed GPUs and other accelerators in AI data centers is so huge that it’s diverting away supply of memory for other uses and causing prices to skyrocket. According to Counterpoint Research, DRAM prices have risen 80-90 precent so far this quarter.
The largest AI hardware companies say
items.summary_zh: 如果现在感觉技术中的一切都与人工智能有关，那是因为它是。在计算机内存市场上，这一点最为真实。用于为人工智能数据中心的GPU和其他加速器供电的DRAM类型的需求和盈利能力是如此巨大，以至于它将内存供应转移到其他用途，并导致价格飙升。根据Counterpoint Research的数据， DRAM价格上涨了80-90% ，因此

items.title: IEEE Honors Global Dream Team of Innovators
items.summary:
Meet the recipients of the 2026 IEEE Medals—the organization’s highest-level honors. Presented on behalf of the IEEE Board of Directors, these medals recognize innovators whose work has shaped modern technology across disciplines including AI, education, and semiconductors.
The medals will be presented at the IEEE Honors Ceremony in April in New York City. View the full list of 2026 recipients on the IEEE Awards website, and follow IEEE Awards on LinkedIn for news and updates.

IEEE MEDAL OF HON
items.summary_zh:
与2026年IEEE奖章的获得者见面--该组织最高水平的荣誉。 这些奖章代表IEEE董事会颁发，旨在表彰在人工智能、教育和半导体等学科领域塑造现代技术的创新者。
奖牌将于4月在纽约市举行的IEEE荣誉颁奖典礼上颁发。 在IEEE大奖网站上查看完整的2026年获奖名单，并关注IEEE大奖

items.title: New Devices Might Scale the Memory Wall
items.summary:
The hunt is on for anything that can surmount AI’s perennial memory wall–even quick models are bogged down by the time and energy needed to carry data between processor and memory. Resistive RAM (RRAM)could circumvent the wall by allowing computation to happen in the memory itself. Unfortunately, most types of this nonvolatile memory are too unstable and unwieldy for that purpose.
Fortunately, a potential solution may be at hand. At December’s IEEE International Electron Device Meeting (IEDM), r
items.summary_zh:
人们正在寻找任何能够超越人工智能常年记忆墙的东西——即使是快速模型也会因在处理器和内存之间传输数据所需的时间和能量而陷入困境。电阻式 RAM (RRAM) 可以通过允许计算在内存本身中进行来绕过这堵墙。不幸的是，大多数类型的非易失性存储器都太不稳定并且难以用于此目的。
幸运的是，一个潜在的解决方案可能就在眼前。十二月时

items.title: Bringing ChatGPT to GenAI.mil
items.summary: OpenAI for Government announces the deployment of a custom ChatGPT on GenAI.mil, bringing secure, safety-forward AI to U.S. defense teams.
items.summary_zh: OpenAI for Government 宣布在 GenAI.mil 上部署自定义 ChatGPT，为美国国防团队带来安全、安全的人工智能。

items.title: Testing ads in ChatGPT
items.summary: OpenAI begins testing ads in ChatGPT to support free access, with clear labeling, answer independence, strong privacy protections, and user control.
items.summary_zh: OpenAI 开始在 ChatGPT 中测试广告，以支持免费访问，具有清晰的标签、答案独立性、强大的隐私保护和用户控制。

items.title: Making AI work for everyone, everywhere: our approach to localization
items.summary: OpenAI shares its approach to AI localization, showing how globally shared frontier models can be adapted to local languages, laws, and cultures without compromising safety.
items.summary_zh: OpenAI 分享了其人工智能本地化方法，展示了全球共享的前沿模型如何在不影响安全的情况下适应当地语言、法律和文化。

items.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis
items.summary: An autonomous lab combining OpenAI’s GPT-5 with Ginkgo Bioworks’ cloud automation cut cell-free protein synthesis costs by 40% through closed-loop experimentation.
items.summary_zh: 一个自主实验室将 OpenAI 的 GPT-5 与 Ginkgo Bioworks 的云自动化相结合，通过闭环实验将无细胞蛋白质合成成本降低了 40%。

items.title: Introducing Trusted Access for Cyber
items.summary: OpenAI introduces Trusted Access for Cyber, a trust-based framework that expands access to frontier cyber capabilities while strengthening safeguards against misuse.
items.summary_zh: OpenAI 推出了 Trusted Access for Cyber​​，这是一个基于信任的框架，可扩展对前沿网络功能的访问，同时加强防止滥用的保护措施。

items.title: Introducing OpenAI Frontier
items.summary: OpenAI Frontier is an enterprise platform for building, deploying, and managing AI agents with shared context, onboarding, permissions, and governance.
items.summary_zh: OpenAI Frontier 是一个企业平台，用于构建、部署和管理具有共享上下文、入职、权限和治理的 AI 代理。

items.title: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex
items.summary: GPT-5.3-Codex is a Codex-native agent that pairs frontier coding performance with general reasoning to support long-horizon, real-world technical work.
items.summary_zh: GPT-5.3-Codex 是 Codex 原生代理，它将前沿编码性能与一般推理相结合，以支持长期的现实技术工作。

items.title: Navigating health questions with ChatGPT
items.summary: A family shares how ChatGPT helped them prepare for critical cancer treatment decisions for their son alongside expert guidance from his doctors.
items.summary_zh: 一个家庭分享了 ChatGPT 如何在医生的专家指导下帮助他们的儿子为重要的癌症治疗决策做好准备。

items.title: GPT-5.3-Codex System Card
items.summary: GPT‑5.3-Codex is the most capable agentic coding model to date, combining the frontier coding performance of GPT‑5.2-Codex with the reasoning and professional knowledge capabilities of GPT‑5.2.
items.summary_zh: GPT-5.3-Codex是迄今为止功能最强大的代理编码模型，将GPT-5.2-Codex的前沿编码性能与GPT-5.2的推理和专业知识能力相结合。

items.title: Unlocking the Codex harness: how we built the App Server
items.summary: Learn how to embed the Codex agent using the Codex App Server, a bidirectional JSON-RPC API powering streaming progress, tool use, approvals, and diffs.
items.summary_zh: 了解如何使用 Codex App Server 嵌入 Codex 代理，Codex App Server 是一个支持流处理进度、工具使用、批准和差异的双向 JSON-RPC API。

items.title: VfL Wolfsburg turns ChatGPT into a club-wide capability
items.summary: By focusing on people, not pilots, the Bundesliga club is scaling efficiency, creativity, and knowledge—without losing its football identity.
items.summary_zh: 通过关注人而不是飞行员，德甲俱乐部正在提高效率、创造力和知识，同时又不失去其足球特色。

items.title: The Sora feed philosophy
items.summary: Discover the Sora feed philosophy—built to spark creativity, foster connections, and keep experiences safe with personalized recommendations, parental controls, and strong guardrails.
items.summary_zh: 探索 Sora feed 理念——旨在激发创造力、促进联系，并通过个性化推荐、家长控制和强大的护栏来保证体验安全。

items.title: Please Don’t Feed the Scattered Lapsus ShinyHunters
items.summary: A prolific data ransom gang that calls itself Scattered Lapsus ShinyHunters (SLSH) has a distinctive playbook when it seeks to extort payment from victim firms: Harassing, threatening and even swatting executives and their families, all while notifying journalists and regulators… Read More »
items.summary_zh: 一个自称为“分散的失败者闪亮猎人”（SLSH）的多产数据勒索团伙在寻求向受害公司勒索报酬时有一套独特的策略：骚扰、威胁甚至殴打高管及其家人，同时通知记者和监管机构……阅读更多 ”

items.title: Who Operates the Badbox 2.0 Botnet?
items.summary: The cybercriminals in control of Kimwolf -- a disruptive botnet that has infected more than 2 million devices -- recently shared a screenshot indicating they'd compromised the control panel for Badbox 2.0, a vast China-based botnet powered by malicious software that comes pre-installed on many Android TV streaming boxes. Both the FBI and Google say they are hunting for the people behind Badbox 2.0, and thanks to bragging by the Kimwolf botmasters we may now have a much clearer idea about that.
items.summary_zh: 控制 Kimwolf（一个已感染超过 200 万台设备的破坏性僵尸网络）的网络犯罪分子最近分享了一张屏幕截图，表明他们已经破坏了 Badbox 2.0 的控制面板。Badbox 2.0 是一个庞大的中国僵尸网络，由预装在许多 Android TV 流媒体盒子上的恶意软件驱动。 FBI 和 Google 均表示他们正在追捕 Badbox 2.0 的幕后黑手，这要归功于 Kimwolf 僵尸大师的吹嘘

items.title: Railway secures $100 million to challenge AWS with AI-native cloud infrastructure
items.summary:
Railway, a San Francisco-based cloud platform that has quietly amassed two million developers without spending a dollar on marketing, announced Thursday that it raised $100 million in a Series B funding round, as surging demand for artificial intelligence applications exposes the limitations of legacy cloud infrastructure.
TQ Ventures led the round, with participation from FPV Ventures, Redpoint, and Unusual Ventures. The investment values Railway as one of the most significant infrastructure st
items.summary_zh:
Railway 是一家总部位于旧金山的云平台，在没有花费一美元营销费用的情况下悄然聚集了 200 万开发人员。该平台周四宣布，由于人工智能应用程序需求的激增暴露了传统云基础设施的局限性，该平台在 B 轮融资中筹集了 1 亿美元。
TQ Ventures 领投，FPV Ventures、Redpoint 和 Unusual Ventures 跟投。 Railwa 的投资价值

items.title: Kimwolf Botnet Lurking in Corporate, Govt. Networks
items.summary: A new Internet-of-Things botnet called Kimwolf has spread to more than 2 million devices, forcing infected systems to participate in massive distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks and to relay other malicious and abusive Internet traffic. Kimwolf's ability to scan the local networks of compromised systems for other IoT devices to infect makes it a sobering threat to organizations, and new research reveals Kimwolf is surprisingly prevalent in government and corporate networks.
items.summary_zh: 一种名为 Kimwolf 的新物联网僵尸网络已传播到超过 200 万台设备，迫使受感染的系统参与大规模分布式拒绝服务 (DDoS) 攻击，并中继其他恶意和滥用性互联网流量。 Kimwolf 能够扫描受感染系统的本地网络以查找其他物联网设备进行感染，这对组织构成了严峻的威胁，新的研究表明 Kimwolf 在网络中出人意料地普遍存在。

items.title: Claude Code costs up to $200 a month. Goose does the same thing for free.
items.summary:
The artificial intelligence coding revolution comes with a catch: it's expensive.
Claude Code, Anthropic's terminal-based AI agent that can write, debug, and deploy code autonomously, has captured the imagination of software developers worldwide. But its pricing — ranging from $20 to $200 per month depending on usage — has sparked a growing rebellion among the very programmers it aims to serve.
Now, a free alternative is gaining traction. Goose, an open-source AI agent developed by Block (the fi
items.summary_zh:
人工智能编码革命有一个问题：成本高昂。
Claude Code 是 Anthropic 的基于终端的人工智能代理，可以自主编写、调试和部署代码，吸引了全世界软件开发人员的想象力。但它的定价——根据使用情况从每月 20 美元到 200 美元不等——在它所服务的程序员中引发了日益强烈的反抗。
现在，免费的替代方案正在受到关注。粘性物

items.title: Listen Labs raises $69M after viral billboard hiring stunt to scale AI customer interviews
items.summary:
Alfred Wahlforss was running out of options. His startup, Listen Labs, needed to hire over 100 engineers, but competing against Mark Zuckerberg's $100 million offers seemed impossible. So he spent $5,000 — a fifth of his marketing budget — on a billboard in San Francisco displaying what looked like gibberish: five strings of random numbers.
The numbers were actually AI tokens. Decoded, they led to a coding challenge: build an algorithm to act as a digital bouncer at Berghain, the Berlin nightclu
items.summary_zh:
阿尔弗雷德·沃尔福斯已经没有选择了。他的初创公司 Listen Labs 需要雇用 100 多名工程师，但与马克·扎克伯格 (Mark Zuckerberg) 的 1 亿美元报价竞争似乎是不可能的。因此，他花了 5,000 美元——营销预算的五分之一——在旧金山的一个广告牌上展示了一些看似无意义的内容：五串随机数字。
这些数字实际上是人工智能代币。解码后，它们带来了编码挑战：构建一个算法来执行

items.title: Patch Tuesday, January 2026 Edition
items.summary: Microsoft today issued patches to plug at least 113 security holes in its various Windows operating systems and supported software. Eight of the vulnerabilities earned Microsoft's most-dire "critical" rating, and the company warns that attackers are already exploiting one of the bugs fixed today.
items.summary_zh: 微软今天发布了补丁，以堵塞其各种 Windows 操作系统和支持的软件中至少 113 个安全漏洞。其中八个漏洞获得了微软最可怕的“严重”评级，该公司警告说，攻击者已经在利用今天修复的漏洞之一。

items.title: Salesforce rolls out new Slackbot AI agent as it battles Microsoft and Google in workplace AI
items.summary:
Salesforce on Tuesday launched an entirely rebuilt version of Slackbot, the company's workplace assistant, transforming it from a simple notification tool into what executives describe as a fully powered AI agent capable of searching enterprise data, drafting documents, and taking action on behalf of employees.
The new Slackbot, now generally available to Business+ and Enterprise+ customers, is Salesforce's most aggressive move yet to position Slack at the center of the emerging "agentic AI" mov
items.summary_zh:
Salesforce 周二推出了公司工作场所助手 Slackbot 的完全重建版本，将其从一个简单的通知工具转变为高管们所说的功能齐全的人工智能代理，能够搜索企业数据、起草文档并代表员工采取行动。
新的 Slackbot 现在普遍可供 Business+ 和 Enterprise+ 客户使用，这是 Salesforce 迄今为止为 Slackbot 定位最积极的举措

items.title: Anthropic launches Cowork, a Claude Desktop agent that works in your files — no coding required
items.summary:
Anthropic released Cowork on Monday, a new AI agent capability that extends the power of its wildly successful Claude Code tool to non-technical users — and according to company insiders, the team built the entire feature in approximately a week and a half, largely using Claude Code itself.
The launch marks a major inflection point in the race to deliver practical AI agents to mainstream users, positioning Anthropic to compete not just with OpenAI and Google in conversational AI, but with Micros
items.summary_zh:
Anthropic 于周一发布了 Cowork，这是一种新的人工智能代理功能，可将其大获成功的 Claude Code 工具的功能扩展到非技术用户 - 据公司内部人士称，该团队在大约一周半的时间内构建了整个功能，主要使用 Claude Code 本身。
这次发布标志着向主流用户提供实用人工智能代理的竞赛的一个重要转折点，使 Anthropic 不仅能够与 Ope 竞争

items.title: Who Benefited from the Aisuru and Kimwolf Botnets?
items.summary: Our first story of 2026 revealed how a destructive new botnet called Kimwolf rapidly grew to infect more than two million devices by mass-compromising a vast number of unofficial Android TV streaming boxes. Today, we'll dig through digital clues left behind by the hackers, network operators, and cybercrime services that appear to have benefitted from Kimwolf's spread.
items.summary_zh: 我们 2026 年的第一个故事揭示了一个名为 Kimwolf 的破坏性新僵尸网络如何通过大规模破坏大量非官方 Android TV 流媒体盒而迅速发展并感染超过 200 万台设备。今天，我们将挖掘黑客、网络运营商和网络犯罪服务留下的数字线索，这些线索似乎从 Kimwolf 的传播中受益。

items.title: Nous Research's NousCoder-14B is an open-source coding model landing right in the Claude Code moment
items.summary:
Nous Research, the open-source artificial intelligence startup backed by crypto venture firm Paradigm, released a new competitive programming model on Monday that it says matches or exceeds several larger proprietary systems — trained in just four days using 48 of Nvidia's latest B200 graphics processors.
The model, called NousCoder-14B, is another entry in a crowded field of AI coding assistants, but arrives at a particularly charged moment: Claude Code, the agentic programming tool from rival
items.summary_zh:
由加密货币风险投资公司 Paradigm 支持的开源人工智能初创公司 Nous Research 周一发布了一种新的竞争性编程模型，据称该模型可匹配或超过多个较大的专有系统 - 使用 48 个 Nvidia 最新的 B200 图形处理器在短短四天内进行了训练。
该模型名为 NousCoder-14B，是人工智能编码助手这个拥挤领域的又一产品，但它出现在一个特别激动人心的时刻：C

items.title: The creator of Claude Code just revealed his workflow, and developers are losing their minds
items.summary:
When the creator of the world's most advanced coding agent speaks, Silicon Valley doesn't just listen — it takes notes.
For the past week, the engineering community has been dissecting a thread on X from Boris Cherny, the creator and head of Claude Code at Anthropic. What began as a casual sharing of his personal terminal setup has spiraled into a viral manifesto on the future of software development, with industry insiders calling it a watershed moment for the startup.

"If you're not reading t
items.summary_zh:
当世界上最先进的编码代理的创造者讲话时，硅谷不仅会听，还会做笔记。
过去一周，工程社区一直在剖析 Anthropic 的 Claude Code 的创始人兼负责人 Boris Cherny 在 X 上的一条帖子。最初只是随意分享他的个人终端设置，现在已经发展成为关于软件开发未来的病毒式宣言，业内人士称其为分水岭

items.title: The Kimwolf Botnet is Stalking Your Local Network
items.summary: The story you are reading is a series of scoops nestled inside a far more urgent Internet-wide security advisory. The vulnerability at issue has been exploited for months already, and it's time for a broader awareness of the threat. The short version is that everything you thought you knew about the security of the internal network behind your Internet router probably is now dangerously out of date.
items.summary_zh: 您正在阅读的故事是一系列独家新闻，包含在更为紧急的互联网范围内的安全建议中。该漏洞已经被利用了几个月，现在是时候让人们更广泛地认识到这一威胁了。简而言之，您认为您所了解的有关互联网路由器后面的内部网络安全性的一切现在可能已经过时了。

items.title: Happy 16th Birthday, KrebsOnSecurity.com!
items.summary: KrebsOnSecurity.com celebrates its 16th anniversary today! A huge "thank you" to all of our readers -- newcomers, long-timers and drive-by critics alike. Your engagement this past year here has been tremendous and truly a salve on a handful of dark days. Happily, comeuppance was a strong theme running through our coverage in 2025, with a primary focus on entities that enabled complex and globally-dispersed cybercrime services.
items.summary_zh: KrebsOnSecurity.com 今天庆祝成立 16 周年！向我们所有的读者致以深深的谢意——无论是新读者、老读者还是路过的评论家。过去一年你们在这里的参与是巨大的，确实是在少数黑暗日子里的一剂良药。令人高兴的是，报应是贯穿我们 2025 年报道的一个强烈主题，主要关注提供复杂且分布在全球的网络犯罪服务的实体。

items.title: Dismantling Defenses: Trump 2.0 Cyber Year in Review
items.summary: The Trump administration has pursued a staggering range of policy pivots this past year that threaten to weaken the nation’s ability and willingness to address a broad spectrum of technology challenges, from cybersecurity and privacy to countering disinformation, fraud and corruption. These shifts, along with the president’s efforts to restrict free speech and freedom of the press, have come at such a rapid clip that many readers probably aren’t even aware of them all.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普政府在过去的一年里推行了一系列令人震惊的政策转向，这些政策转向可能会削弱美国应对从网络安全和隐私到打击虚假信息、欺诈和腐败等广泛技术挑战的能力和意愿。这些转变，加上总统限制言论自由和新闻自由的努力，发生得如此之快，以至于许多读者可能都感到惊讶。
